title: The Perfect Storm
creator_credit: Baltimore Spring Creek Productions, Radiant Productions, Warner Bros. Pictures, Wolfgang Petersen, William Sandell, Erica Edell Phillips, Paula Weinstein, William D. Wittliff and Gail Katz
brief_description: In October 1991, a confluence of weather conditions combined to form a killer storm in the North Atlantic. Caught in the storm was the sword-fishing boat Andrea Gail. Magnificent foreshadowing and anticipation fill this true-life drama while minute details of the fishing boats, their gear and the weather are juxtaposed with the sea adventure.

constellations_other.name: Representing disasters
constellations_other.description: The devastating Indian Ocean tsunami was captured by many people on personal devices and home cameras, with the footage broadcast to the world. The event also inspired feature films that are part of a long tradition of disaster films, which often push the boundaries of VFX.
